creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: large torque with three consecutive rings; rings curve over on themselves with a bird design on each end; connecting piece is covered in wrapped wire with a cone at the very center; largest ring center panel has toucan-like birds; surrounding panels have one large bird and two small birds; each ring has two panels with just floral designs; second ring center has two hummingbirds; surrounding panels have butterfly insects; third and smallest ring has swan-like birds at center, surrounded by four floral panels
title: Torque
